name: dueli
description: منصة المنافسات والحوارات - Dueli Competition & Dialogue Platform

scripts.dev: npm run build:css && npm run build:client && vite
scripts.dev:sandbox: npm run build:css && npm run build:client && wrangler pages dev dist --d1=dueli-db --local --ip 0.0.0.0 --port 3000
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:client && vite build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name dueli
scripts.db:reset: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .wrangler/state/v3/d1 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue" && npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:seed
